r.s: Drop-in CAPTCHA element for QuickForm forms
r.d: This package provides QuickForm interface to the Text_CAPTCHA package. It requires the use of a session to serialize a Text_CAPTCHA instance. Currently drivers for Image, Equation, Figlet and Word are included.
r.n: - Switch to New BSD license - Fixed Image driver to not display superfluous HTML attributes - Upgrade to package.xml version 2.0 - Cosmetic code clean up
